findings.title: The function returns frozen balances in addition to active ones
findings.description: The transfer function can fail if a user decides to transfer all his tokens but has unclaimed vested tokens.

findings.title: Insufficient Token Balance Handling
findings.description: The function sums balances of different tokens and proceeds calculations with those values.

findings.title: Vesting types are not validated. Any number can be passed.
findings.description: The function does not validate vesting types and allows any number to be passed.

findings.title: Incorrect Sponsor Address Return
findings.description: The function returns 0 address for all users whose sponsorId is lower than sponsorId.

findings.title: The function does not actually transfer anything for sponsors with id < 1000000001
findings.description: The function does not transfer anything for sponsors with id less than 1000000001.
